name: Westbury Lodge

reviews.title: Great Place To Stay
reviews.text: Like others, we chose Westbury Lodge because of it's rating on Tripadvisor.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reviews are spot on. The place is spotlessly clean, the room was excellent, the breakfast was lovely and Pam and Sheila couldn't have been more friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: An excellent B&B, highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As we walked around Shanklin, we noticed that a lot of hotels have swimming pools. Had I known that before I booked, I may have gone for one of those.
reviews.title: couldn't have asked for more

reviews.text: However, we would have missed out on a lovely stay at Westbury Lodge.
reviews.title: An outstanding Hotel with proprietors of the highest calibre

reviews.text: Thank you Pam and Sheila!
reviews.title: ...just superb!!

reviews.text: We would have no hesitation in advising anyone to book Westbury Lodge, Pam and Sheila will look after you and the accomodation, is 100% clean and welcoming. Excellent position for everything. Second visit, and would book again without hesitation.
reviews.title: Just book it !!!!!!!!!

reviews.text: The breakfast offers all that you would want, cereal, yoghurt, fruit plus anything you would like, cooked to your likeing.
reviews.title: Fantastic place, Fantastic people

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You have access to the conservatory and lounge and outside area..... not just your room. tv in the room but also in lounge with a selection of dvd's etc available if needed.
reviews.title: The Perfect Place For An Amazing Relaxed Break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Two minutes from beach and five minutes from High St and buses
reviews.title: A very special place indeed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tea and coffee in room, shower gel provided and towels.
reviews.title: Welcoming, friendly and informative

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is as close to perfection as you can get, thanks to Pam and Sheila's attention to every detail of your stay. Comfortable, beautifully decorated and immaculately prepared and maintained rooms, a superb choice of top-quality freshly-cooked breakfasts, all the tourist and eating-out information you could need, and the best welcome you could imagine.
reviews.title: B&B Quality and Hospitality at its very best. Five Stars plus!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pure enjoyment!
reviews.title: A superb place to stay with the most welcoming of hosts.

reviews.text: The Westbury certainly deserves the wonderful reviews it recieves on Trip Advisor, we have never recieved such a warm welcome. The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the offers fantastic value for money, with many unexpected extras such as branded full size shower gel and soap in the bathroom! Our hosts were so warm and relaxed as they greeted us that we felt like we were visiting members of the family. The choice offered at breakfast is fantastic with each individual guests needs being catered for on a daily basis. The Westbury is situated just a short walk away from the seafront at Shanklin, making our stay partially car free as we enjoyed the delights that the town has to offer. We would whole heartedly reccommend The Westbury Lodge to adults wanting high quality accommodation and service at an excellent price. Thank you ladies for a first class stay - we will be back!
reviews.title: Just Lovely.........

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely place to stay topped with the lovely Pam & Shiela who could not do anymore for their guests. We'll see you again soon. Elaine & Freida
reviews.title: Only 5 stars available? I wanted to give it more!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Don't even hesitate to look elsewhere, book this venue as soon as you can. The only reason I can give against this advice is that it might stop us getting a room ourselves next time! Pam and Sheila made our stay better than being at home in their fantastic hotel.
reviews.title: This is addictive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The westbury is a great b&b in Shanklin. Our room was very comfortable and clean with nice touches like bathrobes and nice toiletries . Kath and Dave are great hosts and will try to do anything to make you more comfortable.
reviews.title: An excellent place to stay on the isle of Wight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic location right on the coast.
reviews.title: We could'nt have felt more welcome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very comfortable rooms and nice big lounge area
reviews.title: This is truely a fantastic B&B

reviews.text: Kath and Dave were great hosts and made our stay a delight.
reviews.title: Thanks Pam and Sheila for a great visit!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not to mention the best full english ever, set me right up for the day.
reviews.title: Fully deserves it's great reviews

aka: Westbury Lodge Shanklin, Isle Of Wight
description: Just for adults (16 yrs+), 9 en-suite bedrooms. Peace & tranquility ......moments from sea, clifftops, old village, town, rail and bus stations.
